title: Enchanting Polki & Emerald Gulubandhi Haaram - A Timeless Heritage
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features uncut Polki diamonds of exceptional clarity and vibrant Zambian Emeralds. Set with delicate diamond accents.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a classic Gulubandhi design, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad. The Polki diamonds are set in a closed setting to enhance their brilliance. The emeralds are crafted into floral design between the polki stones. The pendant features a larger polki surrounded by diamond accents, adding an extra touch of elegance. It is a perfect blend of regal tradition with a touch of modern minimalism.
colors: Predominantly gold with contrasting white Polki diamonds and vibrant green Emeralds. The Hyderabadi polish lends a rich
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Ideal for brides seeking a statement piece that honors their heritage or for special events where you want to showcase exquisite traditional jewelry.
description: A stunning testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry-making heritage. This Gulubandhi Haaram is a valuable heirloom piece, showcasing exquisite craftsmanship, exceptional gemstone quality, and timeless design. The combination of Polki diamonds and emeralds is considered highly auspicious and adds a touch of regal elegance. Offers lasting value, both financial and sentimental.
